channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gold is holding above $4,000 for reasons that could drive it to $5,000
item.description: U.S. budget uncertainty and Fed rate-cut hopes fuel safe-haven demand.

item.title: These dividend stocks are good bets for risk-averse investors — even during a bear market
item.description: “Dividend aristocrats” can do more for risk-averse portfolios than supersafe Treasury bonds.

item.title: Think robotics stocks are overhyped? In fact, they’re just taking off.
item.description: Columnist Charlie Garcia responds to readers concerned about robots replacing jobs and about the companies that make them.

item.title: Only one analyst has a sell rating on Nvidia — and he says ‘it feels fantastic’
item.description: Lone Nvidia bear Jay Goldberg shares why he’s still not a buyer of the AI superstock.

item.title: ‘Santa Flaws Rally’ has legs so don’t sell stocks yet, advises Bank of America strategist
item.description: Bank of America’s Michael Hartnett says most asset allocators are likely to stay bullish on stocks and less so on bonds.

item.title: David Einhorn's Greenlight Capital bet on a beaten-down California utility after wildfires
item.description: While PG&E shares have rallied recently, they tumbled 31% in the first half of the year.

item.title: Buy energy stocks for a prospective breakout, says Carter Worth
item.description: Carter Worth looks through the charts of the XLE.

item.title: Dan Loeb's Third Point leans back into tech, doubling Microsoft bet and adding Nvidia, Amazon
item.description: The hedge fund added to a handful of megacap tech names in the third quarter, more than doubling its stake in Microsoft.

item.title: Baupost's Klarman bought into this fast-food stock last quarter before its rebound
item.description: Seth Klarman more than doubled his stake in Restaurant Brands International during the third quarter.

item.title: Dan Sundheim’s D1 Capital buys AI-linked names in third quarter
item.description: Hedge fund D1 Capital started new positions in some stocks tethered to artificial intelligence during the third quarter, a new securities filing shows...

item.title: Firefly Aerospace (FLY): A Compelling Re-Rating Opportunity in Responsive Space and Defense
item.description: Firefly Aerospace (FLY) Q3 earnings beat and raised guidance reveal its pivot to a high-margin responsive space prime contractor. Historical analogues...

item.title: On Holding AG (NYSE: ONON): Premium Innovation as the Engine for Sustained Market Share Gains in Performance Running

item.title: Shutdown Squeeze: How Big Money is Forced to Sell

item.title: CHR Stock Explodes on Buyout Buzz: What Traders Need to Know
